00066 inline 
00067 void blinn_coeffs( 
00068                   miScalar& NdH, miScalar& VdH,
00069                   const normal& N, 
00070                   const vector& L, 
00071                   const vector& V,
00072                   const miScalar NdL, 
00073                   const miScalar NdV
00074                   )
00075 {
00076   mrASSERT( N.isNormalized() );
00077   mrASSERT( L.isNormalized() );
00078   mrASSERT( V.isNormalized() );
00079   miScalar a = L.x * V.x + L.y * V.y + L.z * V.z + 1.0f;
00080   miScalar b = fastmath<float>::invsqrt( a + a );
00081   NdH = (NdL + NdV) * b;
00082   VdH = a * b;
00083 }

00096 inline
00097 miScalar G_attenuation( const miScalar NdV, const miScalar NdL,
00098                         const miScalar NdH, const miScalar VdH )
00099 {
00100   miScalar Gg;
00101   miScalar NdH2 = 2*NdH;
00102   if( NdV < NdL )
00103     {
00104       Gg = NdV*NdH2 / VdH;
00105     }
00106   else
00107     {
00108       Gg = NdL*NdH2 / VdH;
00109     }
00110   return min(1.0f, Gg);
00111 }

00117 inline
00118 miScalar G_attenuation_pixar( const miScalar NdV, const miScalar NdL,
00119                               const miScalar NdH, const miScalar VdH )
00120 {
00121    miScalar NdH2 = 2*NdH;
00122    if( NdV < NdL )
00123    {
00124       miScalar x = NdV*NdH2;
00125       if( x < VdH ) return  NdH / VdH; // shouldn't it be x /VdH?
00126       else          return 1.0f / NdV;
00127    }
00128    else
00129    {
00130       miScalar x = NdL*NdH2;
00131       if( x < VdH ) return    x / (VdH * NdV);
00132       else          return 1.0f / NdV;
00133    }
00134 }

00146 inline miScalar Trowbridge_Reitz( const miScalar NdH, const miScalar k2 )
00147 {
00148 
00149   miScalar D = NdH;
00150   miScalar k4 = k2 * k2;
00151   D = D * D * ( k4 - 1) + 1;
00152   if ( D != 0) {
00153     D = k4 / D;
00154     D *= D;
00155     return D;
00156   }
00157   return 0.0f;
00158 }

00172 inline miScalar Torrance_Sparrow( const miScalar NdH, const miScalar k1 )
00173 {
00174   return M::exp( -( M::pow(k1 * M::acos( NdH ),2) ) );
00175 }

00188 inline miScalar Beckmann( const miScalar NdH, const miScalar m )
00189 {
00190 
00191   miScalar B = M::acos( NdH );
00192   miScalar e = M::exp( M::pow( - (M::tan(B)/m), 2) );
00193   miScalar Bexp = M::pow( B, e );
00194   miScalar Bcos = M::pow( M::cos(Bexp), 4 );
00195   miScalar m2 = M::pow( m, 2 );
00196 
00197   return 1.0f / 4.0f*m2*Bcos;
00198 }

00206 inline miScalar Phong( const vector& V, const normal& N, const vector& L, 
00207                        const miScalar NdL, const miScalar shiny )
00208 {
00209   //               L    N    R
00210   //                *---|---*
00211   //                 \  |  /
00212   //                  \ | /
00213   //        ___________\|/__________
00214   //                    
00215   mrASSERT( N.isNormalized() );
00216   mrASSERT( L.isNormalized() );
00217   mrASSERT( V.isNormalized() );
00218   vector R = N * 2 * NdL - L;
00219   mrASSERT( R.isNormalized() );
00220   return M::pow( max(0.0f, V % R), shiny );
00221 }

00232 inline miScalar
00233 Blong( const normal& N, const vector& H, const miScalar shiny )
00234 {
00235   mrASSERT( N.isNormalized() );
00236   mrASSERT( H.isNormalized() );
00237   return M::pow( N % H, shiny );
00238 }
